page.title: 15RECREATION IN DELABOLE
page.content:
{"The Park"}by Gary Blanchard.
We have a park which contains two sets of swings,a tractor,a rocking horse,roundabout,balancing pole,tyre- tower and castle with a tunnel.The roundabout is a witch's hat.There is an old tractor which has been cemented in.The castle is on a mound with a tunnel underneath.There is also a football field,a cricket field and an old people's garden which has seats.In the summer there are lots of fetes and sales in the park,sometimes one a week,held by the Playing Field Committee,the British Legion or some other organisation.
